name: Bumper Car Destruction
description:
"Bumper Car Destruction" is a game where you must eliminate the opponents by striking them with your bumper car.
But be careful to avoid the opponents coming from opposite direction.
Unlock different equipment to improve your score.
Unlock the customizations for your "bumper car".
Be the best on "Bumper Car Destruction" is your motto.

Your total score will be recorded and you can share it on the internet to show your level to the world.

     Game Features

 • Adrenaline rush guaranteed
 • Unique gaming experience
 • Great Graphics and Animations
 • Extremly addictive
